title: Sick of being punished for client bugs/issues

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Got a timed ban thing (Q time wait) because the client glitches out and dies. Is there away too fix these issues?

replies.body:
It looks like your client is losing its connection to the matchmaking server, which causes your client to become unresponsive. Most of the time, this is caused by the client having a poor connection to the server, and being unable to maintain a solid link. I recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with League by following the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
